segments.text: It's hard to believe what I'm seeing unfold in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently polishing that plate, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is a disaster, an absolute waterfall onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so utterly unaware of the chaos around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, the cabinets are getting drenched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause significant water damage!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are behind her, up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is practically defying gravity on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the floor becoming a pond?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated to watch such blatant inattention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to look up, just for a second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just begging for an accident to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly infuriating how oblivious she remains.
segments.speaker: PAR
